resources.string: Please check camera flash is ok ?

The GSensor Test is used to test whether the gravity sensor is working or not. 
Test Procedure:
1.Roll the device.
2.If the device detects the gravity,the directtion turns on. 
3.If all of the directions turns on,this test procudure will finish automatically,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate this test procedure.

The Keypad Test is used to test whether the Keypad is working or not.
 Test Procedure:
1.According to the notice,press specified Keypad.
 2.If the keyPad works well,this test procedure will finish automatically,else press the [FAIL] bytton to terminate this test procedure.

The Touch Test is used to test the sensitivity of the touch screen by finger pressure.
 Test Procedure:
1.Draw on the screen using fingers.
Press back button to return result,if drawing successful,press the [PASS] button, else press the [FAIL] buton to terminate this test procedure.

The Multiple Touch is used to test whether the multiple touch function of the panel is working or not.
 Test Procedure:
1.Put the fingers on the screen.
2.If the multitouch function works well,this test procedure will finish automatically,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate the test procedure.

The Vibrator si used to test whether the vibrator function of this device is working or not.
 Test Procedure:
1.Press button to control vibrator on or vibrator off.
 2.If the vibrator funtion works well,press [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate this test procedure.
Please shake your hands to remove the external magnetic field
\n Please move your phone close to a light. \n_______________________________________
Please move your phone away from light and cover the top half of it using a hand. \n_______________________________________
The Bluetooth Test is working well
"Scanning is finished, didn't find the Bluetooth device!"
can not find the earphone,please plug your earphone~
"Scanning is finished, didn't find the Sdcard device!"
Please move your hand over the top half of your phone! \n_______________________________________
Please move your hand away from the top half of your phone! \n_______________________________________
Please move your finger on the screen. Press back or menu to choose pass fail.

"The Receiver Test is used to test whether receiver function is working or not.
Test Procedure:
1.Receiver of device will make a sound.
2.If the receiver function works well,press the [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL} button tot terminate this test procedure."

"The Board Mic Test is used to test whether board mic is working or not.
Test Procedure:
1.Press [START] button to record.
2.According to the result played after recording,if the mic function of headset works well,press the [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL} button tot terminate this test procedure."

"The Speaker Test is used to test whether the speacker function of this device is working or not.
Test Procedure:
1.Press [START] button to broadcast sound.
2.If the speacker function works well,press the [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL} button tot terminate this test procedure."

"The Main Camera Capture Test is used to test whether the main camera in device is working or not.
Test Procedure:
1.Press [START] button to b capture photo.
2.If photo capture successful,press the [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL} button tot terminate this test procedure."

"The VGACam Capture Test is used to test whether theVGACam Capture function of this device is working or not.
Test Procedure:
1.Press [START] button to b capture photo.
2.If photo capture successful,press the [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL} button tot terminate this test procedure."
"The Bluetooth Test is used to test whether Bluetooth is working or not.\n(This test procedure will be started automatically without any manual operations.)"
"The Wi-Fi Test is used to test whether the Wi-Fi function of this device is working or not.\n(This test procedure will be started automatically without any manual operations.)"
"The Battery Test is used to test whether a battery is existing in device or not.\n(This test procedure will be started automatically without any manual operations.)"
"The ECompass Test is used to test whether the ECompass sensor is working or not.\n(This test procedure will be started automatically without any manual operations.)"
"The Modem Test is used to test whether the modem on device is working or not.\n(This test procedure will be started automatically without any manual operations.)"

"The CameraFlash Test is used to test whether the RGB color model and brightness of LCD are working or not.\nTest Procedure:1.When start to test,device will open the camera flash automatically.\n2.If the camera flash functions works well ,press the [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate this test procedure."

"The Display Test is used to test whether the camera flash is working or not.\nTest Procedure:1.Click screen to change background.\n2.If the display function works well ,press the [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate this test procedure."

"The Headset Test is used to test whether the left and right chanels of the headset are working or not.
Test Procedure:1.Connect headset to device adn Press [START] button.
2.Broadcast sound to left channel and Broadcast to right channel.
3.If the headset function works well ,press the [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate this test procedure."

"The Headset Mic Test is used to test whether the mic of headset is working or not.
Test Procedure:1.Connect headset to device.
2.Press START button,start to record.
3.According to the result played after recoding,if the mic function of headset works well,press the [PASS] button,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate the test procedure."

"The Headset Main Key Test is used to test the key on headset is working or not.
Test Procedure:1.Connect headset to device.
2.Click the key on headset.
3.If the key function of the headset works well ,this test procedure will finish automatically,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate the test procedure."

"The SD Card Test is used to test whether the SD Card reader function is working or not.
Test Procedure:
1.Put the SD Card in the device.
2.The test procedure will be started automatically without any manual operations."

"The SIMcard Test is used to test whether SIM card is connecting to the device or not.
Test Procedure:
1.Put the SIM card in the device.
2.The test procedure will be started automatically without any manual operations."

"The LightSensor is used to test whether the light sensor is working or not.
Test Procedure:
1.According to the notice,put the device near to or far away the light.
2.If the light sensor function works well,this test procedure will finish automatically,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate this test procedure."

"The Proximity Test is used to test whether the proximity sensor is working or not.
Test Procedure:
1.According to the notice,put your hand near to or far away the sensor of the device.
2.If the proximity sensor function works well,this test procedure will finish automatically,else press the [FAIL] button to terminate this test procedure. "
"The FingerPrint Test is used to test whether FingerPrint is working or not.\n(This test procedure will be started automatically without any manual operations.)"
Check at least one of test item is executed.
